name: One day (itch) (lizeruicq)
description:
You are doing an internship in an English training institution and today you fell in love with your new colleague at first sight,  try to please her to date together after getting off work!

1. You can do dictation or file tasks when you reach at the designated location. You will receive a certain amount of cash after completion, but it will consume time and energy. If the energy is exhausted, the game will end. You can start the same task every half hour.

2.You can have a conversation with Sarah every once in a while (An exclamation mark will appear next to her). Your choice will affect her favorability. Talk to her as much as you can, when you find Sarah likes movies and the favorability for you is greater than 60, you can buy movie tickets and invite Sarah to have a date after getting off work.

3.The shop allows you to buy gifts for Sarah or chips for yourself to replenish your energy. After giving Sarah a gift, your attractiveness will increase, and you will gain more favorability when chatting with the right option)

4.Time will keep passing, arrange your time wisely and continue to please Sarah! 
Will Sarah feel good about you in the end?
